Me encanta visitar Paris, y explorar lo moderno y lo antiguo sin presiones ni apuros.

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(FlickrAPI)
library(pixture)
library(dplyr)
here::i_am("lgrs/Trieste.qmd")
```

```{r}
file_name <- here::here("data","flickr-photos.rds")
flckr_photos <- readRDS(file=file_name)

seleccion <- c("París")
```


```{r}
#| output: asis
htmlcode <- "<center>\n<img src='%s' width='%s'  height='%s'>\n<br/>\n**%s** by <a href='https://www.flickr.com/photos/%s/%s' target='flickr'>JR Ferrer Paris @ flickr</a><br/></center>"

photos <- flckr_photos %>% filter(grepl(seleccion,title) )

show_photo <- photos %>% 
    slice_sample(n=1) %>%
    transmute(code = sprintf(htmlcode, url_m, width_m, height_m, title, owner, id)) %>% pull()
cat(show_photo)
```


## Galería de fotos

```{r}
paths <- photos %>% pull(url_m)
captions <- photos %>% 
  transmute(caption=sprintf("<strong>%s</strong> por <a href='https://www.flickr.com/photos/jferrer/%s' target='flickr'>JR Ferrer Paris @ flickr</a>",title,id)) %>% pull()

pixgallery(paths, caption=captions)

```
